extendedInfo.description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers: - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

reviews.title: Works Fine
reviews.comment: I was able to successfully download and install this app on my Samsung Galaxy Y. It works great and is good for listening practice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Downloadable
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t even download the lessons I would try and it would pop up a message error screen telling me to check my internet and sd card but it\'s neither of those fault
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s cool for learning the basic stuff photo messages could be more clear we need something more ideal for kids (I\'m 12) i can read Korean Japanese Arabic and Russian only problem is these apps don\'t focus on the stuff that we need to learn like basic convo and BTW I DO LANGUAGE TUTORING ON KAKAO TALK I\'D IS daehoyu99
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its Great For Beginners
reviews.comment: This is a great app for beginners who wants to learn Korean. It shows you pictures and helps you how to pronounce the words plus it displays hangul. I recommend for people who wants to learn Korean. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It does have pictures and people speaking the language you\'re trying to learn. But... it\'s kinda hard to tell what the picture is exactly without an english description on the bottom. The first picture was a man holding a cup but I can\'t tell whether it\'s suppose to say \"cup\" or \"to drink\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is great!
reviews.comment: I am quickly learning basic words and phrases.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: This app is so confusing. Dont dl it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to download files
reviews.comment: I\'d love to try this app, but I revive an error message when I try to download the files. T_T
